meanings.definition: A bag used for holding toiletries and other items for washing.
meanings.sent1: I packed my toothbrush and shampoo in the washbag for our trip.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new washbag to organize her bathroom essentials.
meanings.sent3: The washbag was so full, it looked like a tiny suitcase!
meanings.sent4: Her colorful washbag was a rainbow of cleanliness in the bathroom.
meanings.sent5: The washbag, with its compartments and zippers, was a lifesaver during travel.

meanings.definition: To clean or launder items in a washbag.
meanings.sent1: I always wash my delicates in a washbag to protect them.
meanings.sent2: She washbags her socks separately to prevent them from getting lost.
meanings.sent3: He washbags his gym clothes to keep them fresh and clean.
meanings.sent4: The delicate lace was gently washbagged to maintain its beauty.
meanings.sent5: She carefully washbags her silk scarves to ensure they last a long time.
